description: Get more versatility, more functionality, more warmth. This 3-in-1 jacket system features a waterproof-breathable hooded shell, plus an insulated liner with a thermal-reflective interior. You can wear each layer on its own or combine them for maximum cold-weather coverage.
name: Columbia Sportswear Wallowa Park Interchange Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% nylon 210T taffeta, 100% Polyester, Omni-Tech™ Plain Weave 2L 100% polyester, Storm-Lite DP II 100% polyester, Thermarator™ 100% polyester
